arts.sum: European football comes with plenty of glamour - and plenty of prizemoney, with the Gers already pocketing a decent wedge

arts.ttl: How Rangers and Europa League seem made for each other
arts.sum: Finalists in 2022 and now back in the knockout stages despite their domestic difficulties - the Europa League is Rangers' happy place.

arts.sum: Rangers 2-1 Union Saint-Gilloise: The Scots booked their place in the last-16 of the Europa League

arts.ttl: 'Rangers continue to excel in Europe... it's crazy'
arts.sum: Reaction from Ibrox after Rangers make it straight into the last 16 of the Europa League.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement is 'on the barricades' for Rangers as Europa League heroics prove the tide is turning at Ibrox
arts.sum: The Belgian's belief has never wavered and now he's glad others are buying into it after reaching the last 16

arts.ttl: Rangers make late surge into last 16 as Raskin and Cerny goals sink Union SG
arts.sum: Rangers claimed the eighth and final direct place in the last 16 of the Europa League with a nervy win over their Belgian visitors at Ibrox. The midfielder Nicolas Raskin scored his first goal of the season with a header and the fit-again winger Vaclav Cerny doubled that lead soon after the break. Sébastien Pocognoli’s side, who started the night on 11 points, the same as their hosts, had their chances and the defender Kevin Mac Allister reduced the deficit late on but Rangers held out for the win they needed. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Rangers' Matondo joins Hannover on loan
arts.sum: Rangers winger Rabbi Matondo joins German second-tier side Hannover 96 on loan until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Ally McCoist condemns 7 Rangers sins of Hamza Igamane as striker scolded for 'laziness' and warned 'it's not on that'
arts.sum: The Moroccan made mistake after mistake against Union Saint Gilloise and McCoist's frustration grew
